title: Why the Fed shouldn't be cutting rates 'at all' right now
full_text: Why the Fed shouldn't be cutting rates 'at all' right now. Slatestone Wealth chief market strategist Kenny Polcari sits down with Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to explain why he doesn't think the Federal Reserve needs.... Is the market pricing in a big year for the Federal Reserve? More rate cuts, new dovish Fed chair. We're going to cut rates, we're going to get more consumer spending, the Dow is going to go hit 60,0… [+969 chars]
